title: Hobbit Book
description: A new edition of the classic fantasy novel following the journey of Bilbo Baggins, a peace-loving hobbit, as he embarks on a magical adventure.

title: A Game of Thrones
description: In the Western Lands, with eight thousand years of recorded history, the specter of wars and catastrophe constantly hangs over people. Winter is approaching, icy winds are blowing from the north, where ancient races and old gods, displaced by humans, have taken refuge. The rebellious rulers fortunately defeated the mad Dragon King, Aerys Targaryen, who sat on the Iron Throne of the Western Lands, but the overthrown ruler left behind offspring as crazy as himself... The throne was taken by Robert - the most eminent of the rebels. The years of peace have passed, and here are the magnates starting the game of thrones.
